movie.title: The X-Files
movie.actors: Gillian Anderson, David Duchovny, Mitch Pileggi
movie.plot: Two F.B.I. Agents, Fox Mulder the believer and Dana Scully the skeptic, investigate the strange and unexplained, while hidden forces work to impede their efforts.
movie.awards: Won 5 Golden Globes. Another 91 wins & 213 nominations.
